typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		PRODUCT_WK as integer,
		WAREHOUSE_WK as integer,
		TOTAL_STOCK as integer,
		REORDER_STOCK as integer,
		CURRENT_STOCK as integer,
		OrderDate as integer,
		Flag as integer,
		ModifiedDate as date
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> source1
source(output(
		Day_WK as integer,
		Month_WK as integer,
		FullDate as timestamp,
		Year_Code as integer,
		Month_Code as integer,
		Month_Name as string,
		WeekDay_Code as integer,
		Day_Name as string,
		Is_WeekDay as boolean,
		NumberOfWorkDays as integer
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> DimDate
Filter1 aggregate(groupBy(OrderDate,
		PRODUCT_WK,
		WAREHOUSE_WK),
	QuantityStock = sum(QuantityStock)) ~> SumQuantity
source1, DimDate lookup(OrderDate == Day_WK,
	multiple: false,
	pickup: 'any',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> Lookup2
Lookup2 select(mapColumn(
		PRODUCT_WK,
		WAREHOUSE_WK,
		REORDER_STOCK,
		CURRENT_STOCK,
		OrderDate,
		Flag,
		FullDate,
		TOTAL_STOCK
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> Select2
DerivedColumn1 filter(FullDate == currentDate()) ~> Filter1
Select2 derive(FullDate = toDate(toString(FullDate,'yyyy-MM-dd')),
		QuantityStock = TOTAL_STOCK - CURRENT_STOCK) ~> DerivedColumn1
Filter1 select(mapColumn(
		PRODUCT_WK,
		WAREHOUSE_WK,
		REORDER_STOCK,
		CURRENT_STOCK,
		OrderDate,
		Flag,
		FullDate,
		TOTAL_STOCK,
		QuantityStock
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> OriData
SumQuantity, OriData lookup(SumQuantity@PRODUCT_WK == OriData@PRODUCT_WK
	&& SumQuantity@WAREHOUSE_WK == OriData@WAREHOUSE_WK
	&& SumQuantity@OrderDate == OriData@OrderDate,
	multiple: false,
	pickup: 'any',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> Lookup3
Lookup3 select(mapColumn(
		OrderDate = {SumQuantity@OrderDate},
		PRODUCT_WK = {SumQuantity@PRODUCT_WK},
		WAREHOUSE_WK = {SumQuantity@WAREHOUSE_WK},
		QuantityStock = {SumQuantity@QuantityStock},
		REORDER_STOCK,
		CURRENT_STOCK,
		TOTAL_STOCK
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> Select3
Select3 derive(Flag = iif(lesserOrEqual(CURRENT_STOCK,REORDER_STOCK),1,0),
		CURRENT_STOCK = TOTAL_STOCK - QuantityStock) ~> Flag
Flag sink(input(
		OrderDate as integer,
		PRODUCT_WK as integer,
		WAREHOUSE_WK as integer,
		REORDER_STOCK as integer,
		CURRENT_STOCK as integer,
		Flag as integer
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	format: 'table',
	preSQLs:['delete from [out].[StockReport]'],
	mapColumn(
		OrderDate,
		PRODUCT_WK,
		WAREHOUSE_WK,
		REORDER_STOCK,
		CURRENT_STOCK,
		Flag
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> sink1
